TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Must. Add. MOAR!

Waiter, my soup does not exist.

Edited October 27, 2023 by TwoCalories
this new page exists now tho

but where could the issue be 

 

waiter theres and SLS in my soup

Ah yes artemis soup!

waiter! Theres a tiefling in my soup

221010262023

It's a Natural One soup.

Waiter! Is this a pea or a peanut?

It's a pea soup.

Waiter! Why are you in my soup?

Because i bring peanuts

waiter! Why is a kaiju in my soup?

014010272023

We get the Pacific Rim leftovers cheap.

Waiter, my soup is ringing.

Edited October 30, 2023 by ColdJ

Then you need to answer it!

waiter! Did my fax reach the soup?

165510302023

Yes, can't you read the floating letters?

Waiter! Where is the "space" character in this alphabet soup?

The "space" character is Marvin the Martian. They are using the "O" as a soup floaty.

 

Waiter, is this soup from the 24th and a half century?

Yes. Its Duck Dodgers soup with a side of Young Space Cadet.

waiter! Where's the kaboom? There was supposed to be an earth-shattering kaboom!
 

010811012023

Here, please hold this Illudium PU-36 space modulator until the fuse runs down. I will be back in 5 minutes.

Waiter, why is everything covered in soot?

Because your Illudium PU-36 space modulator was not a space detonator and made a mess!

waiter! Games? Did someone say "game"? And perchance for interest's sake, a deadly game? To the game! Shall it be a test of strength? Meaningless, since you have none. A test of intelligence, then? Equally as meaningless! Why these games? Why, the play is the thing. And I'm surprised you have to ask when your human, Shakespeare, explained it all so well. 
 

My dear waiter, perchance you know where i found this verbose verbiage soup?

022211012023

Sorry sir, It was meant to be carbose cabbage soup.

Waiter, do you have the thyme?

Yes, it's time for rhyme!

Waiter! Fugushima sushi, please!

We got the cook to check it was safe to eat. The ambulance is on its way.

Waiter, how fresh is the soup?

It's just squeezed from the soup fruits. It's a fresh.

Waiter! Fresh cognac, please, not this old smelly liquid.

what it doent smell to bad

waiter thers an trap in my soup

Yes, that's how we hunt the mice for it.

Waiter! Well done Saehrimnir steak, please.

steak soup ok 

waiter! theres an booster injition in my soup

The soup is LOX. Any chance you mean "ignition"?

Waiter, are you sure this is soup?

nah it isnt its CH4

Waiter theres an B9 i mys soup

It's been eye now.

Waiter! I ordered snails. I can see shells, but where are slugs?

They are imbeded in the wall behind you. I am amazed that none of them hit you when that snail pulled out that machine gun.

Waiter, do you do noodles?

Am doing them, yes, but you are having ordered them well-being-done.

Waiter! The present tense is much better than that past tense.
